title: Slow to acquire high-accuracy GPS signal on Pixel 3 unless I restart
content:
Recently, apps that need high-accuracy, real-time GPS (Strava, Wahoo Fitness Tracker, etc.) take a long time (>5 minutes) to acquire a signal when the phone hasn't been restarted lately. 

If I restart, it'll acquire a signal in just a few seconds. This has only been a problem for the last few weeks, possibly since I updated to the Apr 5 Security Patch. 

Anyone else seeing this? Any fixes?
